channel.title: Fun PK Error?
channel.description:
Trying to make a Fun PK Area, done most of it just got 1 error. Here's my compile error.
client.java:15176: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isInPitGame location: class client if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel ( combatLevel || combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel ( castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame && !inFunPk()){
Here's my code
if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + AttackingOn2.wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + AttackingOn2.wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk(){
Any Help?

item.title: Fun PK Error?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel ( combatLevel || combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel ( castOnPlayer.combatLevel && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk()){

You have two of these, you have to change the second one also.

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel ( combatLevel || combatLevel + castOnPlayer.wildyLevel ( castOnPlayer.combatLevel && !isInPitGame() && !inFunPk()){

EDIT: What Jc said.

Read full topic
